src/Makefile - libcspec_book

Table of Contents
  1. # Copyright (c) 2014 The libcspec Authors. All rights reserved.
  2. # Use of this source code is governed by a BSD-style license that can be
  3. # found in the LICENSE file. See the AUTHORS file for names of contributors.
  4. ###############################################################################

  6. include ../build_config.mk

  8. Static_lib= libcspec.$(PLATFORM_STATIC_EXT)

  10. C_static_lib_SRC_c= \
  11.         config.c \
  12.         output.c \
  13.         output_header.c \
  14.         output_unit.c \
  15.         output_verbose.c \
  16.         cspec_internal.c \
  17.         runner.c

  19. CSPEC_HEADER_DIR= ../include

  21. MY_COMMON_FLAGS=-std=c99 -I $(CSPEC_HEADER_DIR)
  22. MY_CCFLAGS=

  24. CSPEC_HEADERS= \
  25.         $(CSPEC_HEADER_DIR)/cspec/config.h \
  26.         $(CSPEC_HEADER_DIR)/cspec/cspec.h \
  27.         $(CSPEC_HEADER_DIR)/cspec/output.h \
  28.         $(CSPEC_HEADER_DIR)/cspec/output_header.h \
  29.         $(CSPEC_HEADER_DIR)/cspec/output_unit.h \
  30.         $(CSPEC_HEADER_DIR)/cspec/output_verbose.h \
  31.         $(CSPEC_HEADER_DIR)/cspec/cspec_internal.h


  34. all $(Static_lib): static_lib

  36. test: $(Static_lib) ../tools/cspec_run.sh
  37.         sh ../tools/cspec_run.sh ../tests

  39. check: test


  42. .PHONY: install uninstall

  44. install: $(Static_lib) $(CSPEC_HEADERS)
  45.         mkdir -p $(DESTDIR)/usr/local/include/cspec
  46.         mkdir -p $(DESTDIR)/usr/local/lib
  47.         install -p $(INSTALL_FLAGS) -m 0644 -o root $(Static_lib) $(DESTDIR)/usr/local/lib
  48.         install -p $(INSTALL_FLAGS) -m 0644 -o root $(CSPEC_HEADERS) $(DESTDIR)/usr/local/include/cspec

  50. uninstall:
  51.         rm -rf $(DESTDIR)/usr/local/include/cspec
  52.         rm -rf $(DESTDIR)/usr/local/lib/$(Static_lib)


  55. include ./Makefile.inc
